channel.title: C# WebBrowser-based Logging Boxens.*
channel.description:
* c|p's naming conventions have the best of me.
Anyways, this is a little example of how you can use a WebBrowser to make a fancy logging box. The BBCode() method isn't mine, I leeched it off of somewhere. Available BBCodes are:
[code][b][/b] [i][/i] [u][/u] [url=<urlhere>][/url] [font=<fontnamehere>][/font] [size=<fontsizeherew/units>][/font]
[/code]
src+bin: http://uppit.com/C7SA6W
hurr durr.
EDIT: update&! EDIT2: try this sample: [nobbc][url=http://google.com][i]i[/i] [b]like[b] green [u]boxens[/u][/url][/nobbc] and click it. Enjoy your googles.

item.title: C# WebBrowser-based Logging Boxens.*
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

  • c|p’s naming conventions have the best of me.

Anyways, this is a little example of how you can use a WebBrowser to make a fancy logging box. The BBCode() method isn’t mine, I leeched it off of somewhere.
Available BBCodes are:

[code]



[font=][/font]
[size=<fontsizeherew/units>][/font]

[/code]

src+bin: http://uppit.com/C7SA6W

hurr durr.

EDIT: update&!
EDIT2: try this sample: [nobbc]i [b]like[b] green boxens[/nobbc] and click it. Enjoy your googles.
